        secNum - the section number
        secCap - the section capacity

      • searchCat

        public Course searchCat​(java.lang.String courseName,
                        int courseNum)
        Searches the database for a specified course
        Parameters:
        courseName - the name of the course, ex. ENGG
        courseNum - the number of the course, ex. 233
        Returns:
        the course you are searching for, or null if not found

      • searchCat

        public Course searchCat​(java.lang.String nameNum)
        Another search method that uses the primary search method, but enables easier searching by lumping name and number together
        Parameters:
        nameNum - the course's full name and number, ex. ENGG 233
        Returns:
        the course you are searching for, or null if not found

      • addCourse

        public Course addCourse​(java.lang.String nameNum)
        Adds a course to the course list
        Parameters:
        nameNum - the name and number of the course you want to add, ex. ENGG 233
        Returns:
        the course you added, or null if course already exists

      • removeCourse

        public void removeCourse​(java.lang.String nameNum)
        Removes a course from the course list and removes the course listed as a prereq from all other courses
        Parameters:
        nameNum - the name and number of the course you want to remove, ex. ENGG 233

      • addPreRequisite

        public void addPreRequisite​(java.lang.String advancedCourse,
                            java.lang.String preReqCourse)
        Adds a pre-requisite course to an existing course
        Parameters:
        advancedCourse - the course that will require a prereq
        preReqCourse - the prereq course

        Another variant of the search feature that prints out the results to the console
        Parameters:
        nameNum - the name and number of the course, ex. ENGG 233
